description: This file contains a test suite for data fetching functionality in a React/Redux application, specifically testing the 'fetchCrypto' thunk in the data slice. It mocks global fetch, initializes a store, dispatches fetchCrypto, and checks that data has been loaded into state correctly.

methods.name: fetchCrypto
methods.description: An asynchronous thunk action that fetches cryptocurrency data and populates the Redux store.
